title: Flexible curriculum design for trauma-informed nursing education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening the psychological and practical competencies of current nurses to perform multiple roles (healthcare provider, student, family member) in trauma situations.

learning_goals: Recognize learners' emotional responses in traumatic situations and apply self-management strategies
Develop and implement personalized learning plans within a flexible curriculum framework
Complete project-based assessments analyzing nursing needs of patients with trauma experiences
Utilize communication and problem-solving skills in role conflict situations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
